title: Tenant's remedy for failure by landlord to disclose
context: [ยง521-67] Tenant&rsquo;s remedy for failure by landlord to disclose. If the landlord fails to comply with any disclosure requirement specified in section 521-43 within ten days after proper demand therefor by the tenant, the landlord shall be liable to the tenant for $100 plus reasonable attorney&rsquo;s fees. [L 1972, c 132, pt of ยง1]
